modName: More Interesting Loot - Special Flora of Tamriel Replacer
summary: Adds the plantable ingredients of Special Flora of Tamriel to More Interesting Loot's leveled lists.
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple tweak to help me find my way around mod editing tools.

I'm running both More Interesting Loot and Special Flora of Tamriel together and I was sick of traveling to the Hammerfell border to get a hold of the plantable reagents, so I made this so that SF's reagents can be found and bought where you'd normally find MIL's non-plantable equivalents. Â Does nothing to the reagents you already bought/found.

Let me know if I screwed something up.

ESP only. Requires both mods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48869/?]More Interesting Loot[/url] by GenghisBob
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49996/?]Special Flora of Tamriel[/url] by Link815
author: monkeyemoness
